item.title: Florence Pugh's Real-Life Oppenheimer Character Explained — Everything To Know About Jean Tatlock
item.description: Jean Tatlock, played by Florence Pugh in Nolan’s Oppenheimer, was a real-life figure whose story is inextricable from Robert Oppenheimer’s.

item.title: Disney's Snow White Remake Has Now Been Banned In One Country
item.description: As the controversy surrounding Disney’s live-action Snow White continues, a new report reveals that the film has now been banned in one country.

item.title: How To Watch Star Wars Celebration 2025 Online
item.description: Star Wars Celebration 2025 will feature plenty of exciting news for fans, so here's how to enjoy the event from home if you can't make it to Japan.
